name: Flip Runner
description:
Run, jump, and defy gravity as you blast past endless pointy things that aim to rip you to pieces!

Flip Runner is a fast paced arcade game that takes classic endless running action and flips it on it's head!

Run on the top or the bottom to avoid the obstacles and collect power ups. Try and run as far as you can in this stunning, hyper addictive, endless runner!

AWESOME FEATURES INCLUDE:
- Fast paced endless running action!
- Stat Tracking
- Power Ups
- Hats!!!
- Super addictive game play!
- Fun effects, music and colors!
- Randomly generated levels!
- Steadily increasing speed and difficulty!

You can't run forever you know! ;)
